snippet: The state television broadcasted clips from what was described as encrypted video footage extracted from the camera of an unarmed American surveillance drone.
abstract: Iranian state television broadcasts clips from what military officials say is encrypted video footage extracted from camera of unarmed American surveillance drone seized in Iranian territory in December 2011; Iran points to seizure of drone and decoding of clips as demonstration of its military advances.

byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY and RICK GLADSTONE

lead_paragraph: The state television broadcasted clips from what was described as encrypted video footage extracted from the camera of an unarmed American surveillance drone.

headline.seo: Iran TV Shows Video It Says Came From U.S. Drone
headline.main: Iran Shows Video It Says Was Made by U.S. Drone
headline.print_headline: Iran Shows Video It Says Was Made By U.S. Drone
